hero.headline: Know your caffeine. Own your <1>sleep</1>.
hero.subtitle: The only caffeine tracker that learns from your actual metabolism and sleep patterns. Not generic. Yours.

features.heading: Everything you need to understand your <1>caffeine</1>

metabolism.label: Scientific
metabolism.title: Personalized Metabolism
metabolism.description: Your caffeine half-life isn't average. Tazza factors in pregnancy, birth control, smoking, medications, and sensitivity to calculate YOUR unique decay curve.

sleepCountdown.label: Intelligent
sleepCountdown.title: Sleep-Safe Countdown
sleepCountdown.description: A real-time countdown to when your caffeine drops below the sleep-safe threshold. No more guessing if that afternoon coffee will keep you up.

quickLog.label: Effortless
quickLog.title: 2-Tap Logging
quickLog.description: Log any drink in two taps. Smart predictions learn your habits and surface your usual order at the right time.

watch.label: On Your Wrist
watch.title: Apple Watch
watch.description: Complications on your watch face. Quick-log from your wrist. Your caffeine status at a glance, wherever you are.

widgets.label: Always Visible
widgets.title: Widgets & Live Activities
widgets.description: Lock screen widgets, home screen widgets, and Dynamic Island — your caffeine level is always one glance away.

step1.title: Log your drink
step1.description: Two taps. That's it. Pick from 100+ pre-loaded drinks or add your own.

step2.title: See your curve
step2.description: Watch your personalized caffeine decay curve in real time, color-coded by zone.

step3.title: Know when you're sleep-ready
step3.description: A clear countdown tells you exactly when caffeine drops below your sleep threshold.

drinkLibrary.heading: 100+ drinks, <1>USDA-accurate</1> data
drinkLibrary.description: From espresso to matcha to energy drinks — every caffeine value sourced from USDA data. Add custom drinks with your own measurements.

testimonial.quote: I had no idea my afternoon cold brew was why I couldn't fall asleep. Tazza showed me exactly when to stop — now I sleep like I used to.
testimonial.author: Early beta tester
